323954.<voice_nw IEV_AST_HYZ_M01 0>\n「どうした <pc>:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_HYZ_M01 0>
What's up, <pc>?
You need something from me?
<break>

323955.<voice_nw IEV_AST_EST_M01 0>\n「私に 何か できる:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_EST_M01 0>
If there's anything I can do to assist you,
please do not hesitate to call on me.
<break>

323956.<voice_nw IEV_AST_YSK_M01 0>\n「よう <pc>。\:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_YSK_M01 0>
Yo, <pc>!
Something I can help you with?
<break>

323957.<voice_nw IEV_AST_VAR_M01 0>\n「この私に 何の用向:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_VAR_M01 0>
You need something from me?
This had better be important.
<break>

323958.<voice_nw IEV_AST_ASB_M01 0>\n「うん？ 僕に 何か:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_ASB_M01 0>
Yes? Do you need something?
I'm always open to a heart-to-heart chat,
you know.
<break>

323960.<voice_nw IEV_AST_SIN_M01 0>\n「おや <pc>さん:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_SIN_M01 0>
Oh, <pc>!
Is there anything I can do for you?
<break>

323962.<voice_nw IEV_AST_EST_M01 1>\n「他には 何か あり:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_EST_M01 1>
Is there anything else you need of me?
<break>

323964.<voice_nw IEV_AST_VAR_M01 1>\n「まだ 何か あるの:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_VAR_M01 1>
You still require something from me?
<break>

323965.<voice_nw IEV_AST_ASB_M01 1>\n「他に 何かあるかな:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_ASB_M01 1>
Is there something else you need?
Or would you rather stay and chat?
<break>

323966.<voice_nw IEV_AST_IRS_M01 1>\n「他にも 何かあった:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_IRS_M01 1>
Let me know if there's anything else you
need.
<break>

323967.<voice_nw IEV_AST_SIN_M01 1>\n「他には どんな ご:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_SIN_M01 1>
Is there anything else I can do for you?
<break>

323968.<voice_nw IEV_AST_HYZ_M01 9>\n「もう いいのか？\:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_HYZ_M01 9>
You good now? If anything else comes up,
just give me a holler.

323969.<voice_nw IEV_AST_EST_M01 9>\n「また 何か ありま:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_EST_M01 9>
If you still need anything, you know you
can always come to me.

323970.<voice_nw IEV_AST_YSK_M01 9>\n「ああ。いつでも 声:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_YSK_M01 9>
Got it. I'm always here if you need me.

323971.<voice_nw IEV_AST_VAR_M01 9>\n「また 何かあれば:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_VAR_M01 9>
If there's ever anything else, I'll accompany
you.

323972.<voice_nw IEV_AST_ASB_M01 9>\n「君なら 大歓迎だか:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_ASB_M01 9>
You're always more than welcome to
reach out to me.

323974.<voice_nw IEV_AST_SIN_M01 9>\n「また お待ちしてい:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_SIN_M01 9>
I'll be waiting here for you.

324179.<voice_nw IEV_AST_HYZ_M01 4>\n「……なんだろうな。:
What's this now...? Suddenly I'm reminded of all the things we've been through together.
We've had a pretty long journey together, haven't we? I reckon it won't stop anytime soon, so I want you to have this.

324180.<voice_nw IEV_AST_EST_M01 4>\n「まあ これは なん:
My, what's this? I can feel your warm-heartedness emanating from these crystals...
Somehow, I feel like you and I have become bonded by our hearts. Please take this as proof of that bond.

324181.\n<voice_nw IEV_AST_YSK_M01 4>\n「……胸があたた:
My heart feels warm...what a strange sensation. My memories with you came flooding back. It's a bit embarrassing, to be honest...
Well, anyways, you should take this. It's proof of our bond. Take good care of it, will you?

324182.\n<voice_nw IEV_AST_VAR_M01 4>\n「なんだ これは:
What's this? These sappy thoughts of yours are seeping into my head!
...But it's not all bad. It's hard to believe that I've been influenced by you this much. Here, you should take this.

324183.<voice_nw IEV_AST_ASB_M01 4>\n「ん？ これは 何か:
Hm? What's this now...? Holding these, the memories of our time together came rushing into my head.
The bond we've formed through our experiences both good and bad is something I'll always treasure. Please, take this. And thank you.

324184.<voice_nw IEV_AST_IRS_M01 4>\n「これは 何かしら？:
What is this? I feel like I'm being enveloped in your generosity and kindness, ...
Hehe... You've always been so important to me. Please take this as proof of our bond.

324185.<voice_nw IEV_AST_SIN_M01 4>\n「おや？ これは い:
Huh? Is this...? I'm suddenly reminded of all the memories we've shared together.
We're essentially inseparable at this point. Please take this as a proof of the bonds we've forged.

324209.<voice_nw IEV_AST_HYZ_M01 2>\n「ずいぶんと キレイ:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_HYZ_M01 2>
Those crystals sure are pretty, aren't they?
Hey, bring me some more, okay?
<end>

324210.<voice_nw IEV_AST_EST_M01 2>\n「まあ きれいな結晶:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_EST_M01 2>
My, what beautiful crystals! If you find
any more, would you please bring them
to me?
<end>

324211.<voice_nw IEV_AST_YSK_M01 2>\n「その結晶 なかなか:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_YSK_M01 2>
Those crystals seem to be pretty valuable.
If you find any more, bring them back here.
<end>

324212.<voice_nw IEV_AST_VAR_M01 2>\n「ふむ……その結晶:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_VAR_M01 2>
Hmm...these crystals have a nice glow to
them. Find more and bring them to me.
<end>

324213.<voice_nw IEV_AST_ASB_M01 2>\n「これは……なんとも:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_ASB_M01 2>
Wow...what stunning crystals these are.
Please, <pc>... If you find any
more, could you please bring them to me?
<end>

324214.<voice_nw IEV_AST_IRS_M01 2>\n「その結晶……とても:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_IRS_M01 2>
These crystals...they're so pretty. If you
can, could you bring me any more that you
find?
<end>

324215.<voice_nw IEV_AST_SIN_M01 2>\n「おや……？ すばら:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_SIN_M01 2>
Oh...? What amazing crystals. If you're
able to find any more of them, please
bring them here.
<end>

324239.<voice_nw IEV_AST_HYZ_M01 3>\n「けっこう 集めてき:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_HYZ_M01 3>
You've collected quite a lot of these. Don't
really know why, but when I look at 'em, I
feel like I wanna get to know you better.
<end>

324240.<voice_nw IEV_AST_EST_M01 3>\n「たくさん 集めてく: You've given me so many... When I look at these crystals, I feel like I want to know more about you. It's strange...

324241.<voice_nw IEV_AST_YSK_M01 3>\n「よしよし。たくさん:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_YSK_M01 3>
Good, good...you've gathered a lot, huh?
I dunno why, but staring at these crystals
makes me want to get to know you better...
<end>

324242.<voice_nw IEV_AST_VAR_M01 3>\n「たくさん 集めたよ:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_VAR_M01 3>
You've collected quite a few, I see. Looking
at these crystals, it makes me want to know
more about you. How utterly annoying...
<end>

324243.<voice_nw IEV_AST_ASB_M01 3>\n「こんなにたくさん:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_ASB_M01 3>
You've collected so many of them! How odd...
When I look at these crystals, all I want is
just to know more and more about you.
<end>

324244.<voice_nw IEV_AST_IRS_M01 3>\n「たくさん 集めたわ:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_IRS_M01 3>
You've really gathered so many. Staring at
them makes me want to know even more
about you... Hehe.
<end>

324245.<voice_nw IEV_AST_SIN_M01 3>\n「たくさん 集めまし:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_SIN_M01 3>
You've sure collected a lot of these. When I
look at these crystals, I feel like I want to
know more about you... Weird, right?
<end>

324269.<voice_nw IEV_AST_HYZ_M01 6>\n「……おい。\n そ:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_HYZ_M01 6>
...Hey. Your equipment bag's busting at the
seams. Sort that out and them come back
here.

324270.<voice_nw IEV_AST_EST_M01 6>\n「あら……？\n そ:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_EST_M01 6>
Oh...? It appears your equipment bag is too
full right now. Could you sort it out and then
come back and see me?

324271.<voice_nw IEV_AST_YSK_M01 6>\n「おっと。そうびぶく:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_YSK_M01 6>
Oops. Looks like you got no more room in
that equipment bag of yours. Free up some
space, and then come back!

324272.<voice_nw IEV_AST_VAR_M01 6>\n「……おい そうびぶ:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_VAR_M01 6>
Hey, your equipment bag is too full.
Sort that all out and then return to me.

324273.<voice_nw IEV_AST_ASB_M01 6>\n「おや。<pc>。\:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_ASB_M01 6>
Um, <pc>... It appears your
equipment bag is too full. Please make
some room and then come back here.

324274.<voice_nw IEV_AST_IRS_M01 6>\n「あら……？\n そ:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_IRS_M01 6>
Huh...? Your equipment bag looks pretty
full. Please make some room and then
come back to see me.

324275.<voice_nw IEV_AST_SIN_M01 6>\n「おや……？\n そ:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_SIN_M01 6>
Hm...? Your equipment bag looks a little full.
Why not sort that out first, then come back
and see me?

324284.<voice_nw IEV_AST_HYZ_M01 7>\n「おっ。けっこう 集:
Wow, you really gathered a lot of these. Nice work there, .
Thanks to you, I feel like our bond's gotten pretty strong. It's kinda embarrassing to say so, but...yeah.

324285.<voice_nw IEV_AST_EST_M01 7>\n「まあ こんなに集め:
My, have you really collected this many? Your heart is always filled with so much warmth.
I feel like our bond has grown even stronger thanks to everything that you've done. Please continue to be by my side.

324286.<voice_nw IEV_AST_YSK_M01 7>\n「こんなに集めるまで:
Seems like you've gone through a lot of trouble to collect this much. I'm touched at your efforts to please me so much!
Seems like our bond's grown even further. If you ever find yourself in a bind, you can always rely on me first and foremost.

324288.<voice_nw IEV_AST_ASB_M01 7>\n「すごいよ！ たくさ:
Amazing! You've collected so many of them! I can feel our bond growing even stronger because of it.
I can definitely feel your sincerity. There is sure to be more challenges ahead of us, so let's continue to rely on one another.

324289.<voice_nw IEV_AST_IRS_M01 7>\n「こんなに集めるなん:
It's amazing how you've managed to gather so many. I'm happy to feel your kindness yet again.
Our bond is something that can never be broken. Let's keep supporting each other, okay?

324290.<voice_nw IEV_AST_SIN_M01 7>\n「わあ こんなに集め:
Wow, you've really collected so many! I can feel the hardships of the path you have taken so far.
Our bond is even stronger than before. Let's continue helping one another out as we can.

324388.<color_yellow>\n仲間から 受け取ったこころは\nこころの器の 中:
The Hearts that you receive from your companions are stored inside of the Heart Holder.
Hearts are equipment items. By selecting the Heart Holder under "Equip", a list of Hearts you currently possess will be displayed.
Selecting a Heart from this list will allow you to equip it.
If you need another Heart Holder, you can get another one from at the Otherworld Outpost.

327604.<voice_nw IEV_AST_RAD_M01 0>\n「どうした？ 俺に:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_RAD_M01 0>
What's wrong? If you need something,
just go on and say it.
<break>

327606.<voice_nw IEV_AST_RAD_M01 1>\n「他にも 用があるの:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_RAD_M01 1>
Do you need something else?
<break>

327608.<voice_nw IEV_AST_RAD_M01 9>\n「もう 行くのか？\:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_RAD_M01 9>
You're leaving already? Feel free to call on
me if you'd like.

327636.ラダ・ガートに こころの結晶を\n<%nM_num>こ 渡しますか？\n<yes:
Give <%dM_num> Heart Crystals
to Lada Gart?
<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

327638.<pc>は ラダ・ガートに\nこころの結晶を <%nM_num>こ 渡した！\n:
<pc> gives <%dM_num> Heart Crystals
to Lada Gart!
<end>

327640.<voice_nw IEV_AST_RAD_M01 4>\n「これは……！\n:
What is...?! My memories of us together are coming back to me...?
Just thinking back on the time we spent together warms my heart. I shall give this to you, my irreplaceable friend.

327644.<voice_nw IEV_AST_RAD_M01 2>\n「ほう……美しい結晶:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_RAD_M01 2>
Wow...what a beautiful crystal.
If you ever find any more, I'd be happy
to take it off your hands.
<end>

327646.こころの結晶が <%nM_num>こ集まれば\n何か起こりそうだ。\n<end>:
If you gather <%dM_num> Heart Crystals,
something is bound to happen.
<end>

327647.こころの結晶が <%nM_num>こ集まれば\n何か起こりそうだ。\n<end>:
If you gather <%dM_num> Heart Crystals,
something is bound to happen.
<end>

327648.\n<voice_nw IEV_AST_RAD_M01 3>\n「ずいぶん 結晶:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_RAD_M01 3>
Collected quite a lot of crystals, I see.
How strange... Just looking at their glow
makes me all the more curious about you...
<end>

327652.<voice_nw IEV_AST_RAD_M01 6>\n「なんだ。そうびぶく:
<voice_nw IEV_AST_RAD_M01 6>
What? Your equipment bag's a bit full.
I think you should organize it bit before
coming back to see me.

327654.<voice_nw IEV_AST_RAD_M01 7>\n「ほう……。たいした:
Oh, ho...how very impressive! It must've been quite difficult to collect this many.
This is proof of the bond we share. I shall gladly accept it. ...Let's keep looking out for one another.

327656.ラダ・ガートとの 絆が深まり\nラダ・ガートのこころが\nレベル<%dM_HEA:
Your bond with Lada Gart has strengthened,
increasing the level of Lada Gart's Heart
to Lv. <%dM_HEART_LEVEL>!
<me 71><end>

327657.ハクオウとの 絆が深まり\nハクオウのこころが\nレベル<%dM_HEART_L:
Your bond with Hakuo has strengthened,
increasing the level of Hakuo's Heart
to Lv. <%dM_HEART_LEVEL>!
<me 71><end>

327660.<color_yellow>\n仲間から 受け取ったこころは\nこころの器の 中:
The Hearts that you receive from your companions are stored inside of the Heart Holder.
Hearts are equipment items. By selecting the Heart Holder under "Equip", a list of Hearts you currently possess will be displayed.
Selecting a Heart from this list will allow you to equip it.
If you need another Heart Holder, you can get another one from at the Otherworld Outpost.

327661.<color_yellow>\n仲間から 受け取ったこころは\nこころの器の 中:
The Hearts that you receive from your companions are stored inside of the Heart Holder.
Hearts are equipment items. By selecting the Heart Holder under "Equip", a list of Hearts you currently possess will be displayed.
Selecting a Heart from this list will allow you to equip it.
If you need another Heart Holder, you can get another one from at the Otherworld Outpost.
